column4: Anybody around who can tell me where flash does send its sound?
I've sound working for skype and the KDE apps but flash is silent
Removed all pulse from my system to make sound work at all
Is it possible to use flash with sound without pulse?
that doesn't even have info for jaunty ... it worked fine on older distros
I want to get *rid* of pulse, not have what Lennart thinks is perfect
i see but doesn't seem a clever choice to
pulse doesn't work, clever or not
I'll give up for now, I'm getting frustrated and that's not helpful when trying to sort this out. I'll be at UDS next week and complain in person :)
thanks for the friendly help anyway
